ctx: induction s as [|a p|x IHx y IHy].
exceptions.tactic: specialize (H a p eq_refl) as [n [H1 H2]].
exceptions.exn: In environment a : ad p : prec_list sigma : signature pa : pre_ad H : state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset (M1 prec_list a p) sigma pa The term "eq_refl" has type "MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) a = MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) a" while it is expected to have type "MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) a = Some p" (cannot unify "MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) a" and "Some p").

ctx: induction s as [|a p|x IHx y IHy].
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: induction s as [|a p|x IHx y IHy].
exceptions.exn: In environment x, y : Map prec_list sigma : signature pa : pre_ad H : state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset (M2 prec_list x y) sigma pa IHx : state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset x sigma pa -> st_compat_check_0 pa sigma x = true IHy : state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset y sigma pa -> st_compat_check_0 pa sigma y = true Unable to unify "st_compat_check_0 pa sigma x = true" with "st_compat_check_0 (pre_ad_O pa) sigma x = true".

ctx: induction s as [|a p|x IHx y IHy].
exceptions.exn: The reference Nat was not found in the current environment.

ctx: induction s as [|a p|x IHx y IHy].
exceptions.exn: The reference auto was not found in the current environment.

original: intros s sigma pa H. induction s as [|a p|x IHx y IHy]. - reflexivity. - simpl. specialize (H a p eq_refl) as [n [H1 H2]]. destruct (pl_compat_check p) eqn:H3. + rewrite H1. apply Nat.eqb_eq. auto. + reflexivity. - simpl. apply andb_true_iff. split. -- apply IHx. apply (state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset_M2 s1 s2 sigma pa) in H. apply H. ++ apply IHy. apply (state_correct_wrt_sign_with_offset_M2 s1 s2 sigma pa) in H. destruct H. auto.
